metrics.engagement_rate: Averaged 28% across channels, highest 35% in email campaigns

insights: Our audience segmentation and messaging strategies are effective but require further refinement. Digital channels perform well, but traditional media present untapped opportunities.
recommendations: Implement AI-driven analytics for enhanced audience segmentation.
Revise messaging strategies for clarity around product benefits.
Explore underutilized communication channels for specific demographics.
Establish a real-time dashboard for ongoing performance monitoring.
